Package com.K05.Mais_Maze_Android_App

Class SettingsFragment

java.lang.Object
androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
com.K05.Mais_Maze_Android_App.SettingsFragment
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, androidx.activity.result.ActivityResultCaller, androidx.lifecycle.HasDefaultViewModelProviderFactory, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, androidx.savedstate.SavedStateRegistryOwner
public class SettingsFragment extends androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
This Fragment is displayed whenever the user selects the MenuItem with the ID of "action_settings". It displays all the settings that the user is able to modify.

    • checkSelectedSteeringMethod

      public void checkSelectedSteeringMethod(SettingsDatabase settingsDatabase)
      This method simply checks which steering method's respective radio button is currently selected and stores that information in the SettingsDatabase
      Parameters:
      settingsDatabase - the SettingsDatabase object which contains the settings data

    • getSteeringMethod

      public String getSteeringMethod(SettingsDatabase settingsDatabase)
      This method checks the SettingsDatabase for information on which steering method has been selected
      Parameters:
      settingsDatabase - the SettingsDatabase object which contains the settings data
      Returns:
      the chosen steering method. Can be either "ESP32" or "Phone"
